name: Phillution
description:
Just a little game made in two days for the 16th edition of the GM(48) game jam.

Has shitty art and shitty music that changes slightly every time you play, and also shitty code, so there might be some bugs here and there, nothing too bad or crashes though.

It's just an idea for now, and there's not much content.

human diarrhea.
— PHIL FISH (@PHIL_FISH) August 19, 2014

Oh, also, I secretly love Phil Fish but I can't say it out loud because everyone hates him, enjoy the game, if you can.


If I make a full game out of this I'll put it here, keep waiting for now.
